txt.en: 'The task set before us may be the most important challenge that the Elfward will ever encounter. We ride now to meet our destiny, perhaps for the final time. We must not let the defences of Faldham fall, or all will be lost to us.'

'Victory for the Elfward! The people of Faldham will continue to live and prosper free from the tyranny of the White Hand Uruks and their cruel master. \n\n'We owe our success today to your brave deeds, [placeholder]. Know always that you are welcome among my people, and that we are honoured to count you among our allies.'
'Prepare yourself, [placeholder]. United, we shall face our enemies.'
Thane Elfmar and his Elfward have prepared for the defence of Faldham. Outnumbered, the skill, determination, and focus of each man will surely be tested.
Defend Faldham with the help of the Elfward
Thane Elfmar awaits at the mead hall of Faldham.\n\nThe Elfward of Faldham will have all of their abilities tested in defending their home.
Elfmar can be found at the mead hall of Faldham.\n\nThane Elfmar wishes to discuss the outcome of the battle, and the future of Faldham.
